desc: I am looking for professional marketer who understand how to discover most profitable and less competitive keywords and optimize listings to target these keywords. I understand that recently Amazon changed search term field from whatever it was to 250 keywords or ignore, you must understand that concept.You must understand how to search for keywords using merchant words and other sources, how to identify keywords specifically searched on Amazon. Google is different. We only care about Amazon.For each listing you will provide me with Title, Bullet Points, Description and Search Terms. You will also advise me on what else needs to be changed and why.First, my content writer will come up with selling copy and from that point, you will take that text and optimize it so it is going to sell better.You must have prior experience optimizing Amazon listings. You need to provide examples and explain what you did and how to get from point A to point Z.Experience in marketing, writing, keyword research and discovery. You must have some knowledge about Sports Products, Supplements and Clothing.Do not send me generic bid text you cut and paste from project to project, I will decline. In your bid, explain why do you think that you are the most qualified for this job.Budget is $10 per listing and there will be 500 or more listings. I need you to deliver at least 2 a day.Place your bid for $10 and if we like what you do, we will create milestones at 10 products each.
title: Need Amazon Listing Optimization Help

desc: In order to apply you must be born and educated in USA. No international writers will be considered. You must have experience writing selling copy and have some type of degree related to marketing. Experience writing selling copy for sports products, supplements and clothing.Looking for a content writer / marketer who understands how to optimize listings on Amazon for better selling performance and keywords.I need help with Title, Bullet Points and description.Title:  200 characters (approx 30 words)Bullet Points (Key Product Features): 5 fields - 500 characters each - 2500 characters (approx 400 words).Description: 200 characters (approx. 400 words).Total: 830 words per product listing.Every article must pass copyscape match search 100%I can pay $20 per listing - 800-1000 words each. There will be at least 500 listings.Bid on one product - $20 and if we like what you do, we will extend to unlimited amount of work. We need at least 2 product listings per day delivered. Do not send us your profile link or generic bid that you cut and paste from one offer to another, we will reject it right away and instead, explain in your bid why you think you qualify for this work.

Must have SEO experience on and off eBay- Must be able to create SEO rich titles- Must be able to create descriptions that are both structured and SEO friendly- Must have proven experience working on eBay and understand eBay's Terms of Service.- Would prefer someone that has experience with Diamond Jewelry but don't be afraid to apply even if you don't.- Must be able to work 45 hours a week Monday-Friday- Experience with flat files or inventory systems such as Kyozou would be niceOverall we're looking for a person that will be capable of working day by day to improve our listings, create new listings and boost our GMV/Sales.Having experience with eBay is a must, so when applying please make sure to provide references of stores you have worked with or are currently working with and why we should hire you for this position.For all those that apply please note that we will only be contacting those that meet the requirements stated above, any spam or copy and paste applications will be ignored.Ongoing project: SEO Specialist, eBay Optimization/Listing/Marketing/TitlesProject Type: Ongoing projectYou will be asked to answer the following questions when submitting a proposal:Have you worked with Diamond Jewelry in the past if so what kind and for which company?How much experience you have with eBay marketplace and Internet marketing?What part of this project most appeals to you?Please give us a detailed explanation how you improve our traffic and rank position on ebay's search engine.Do you have other skills that are not mentioned within the description of this job posting that would be valuable to us or this job that you can think of?

desc: I am in the startup of a social and enviroental clothes brand.Our first collection will consist of Organic cotton quality Polo shirts for men, in 4 color variations.Beside durability, comfort and aesthetics, we measure quality in sustainability and social impact, so 20% of the sales price of each sold product will be donated to an charitable organization selected by the customer, from a list of preselected options.We will only be selling B2C from an online store.We are looking for commission based sales personnel from different geographical locations, interested in selling our products online.It will be done in a way, so that each freelance salesperson gets his own discount code he/she can advertise with.The sales persons will give the customers they provide this code to enter when they buy something, to get a 5% discount on the products purchased.The freelance salesperson will then receive another 5% of the total sales price for each sold piece with his code entered.The sales price will be around 50 dollars per piece so the freelancer will earn about 2.5 dollars for each piece sold on behalf of his work.In other words, it is up to you when and how much you want to work, but you will only be paid for the sales you provide.So if you get 10 customers a month you've earned 25 dollars. If you get 100 customers per month you've earned 250 dollars and so on.Let me know if this is something you're interested in.Best regardsCharlie
